summary: This document is an email exchange between Amanda Kirby and Lisa D Hurd discussing financial transactions related to Southern Financial. They mention the completion of certain transactions and the value of shares being posted to a client's account.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, discussing financial transactions with a client.

persons.name: Lisa D Hurd
persons.context: Lisa D Hurd works at Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. and is involved in the operations of posting financial transactions.

connections.description: Both individuals work at Deutsche Bank, collaborating on financial transactions.

keyFacts: Amanda Kirby and Lisa D Hurd are discussing financial transactions related to Southern Financial.
They mention the completion of transactions and the posting of shares to a client's account.
The email indicates a positive sentiment about the completion of their tasks.
